thread.title: Why DON'T people understand losing best friend is painful
thread.title_full: Why DON'T people understand losing best friend is painful

title: Why DON'T people understand losing best friend is painful
text: show ad Why DON'T people understand losing a best friend is as painful as losing a loved one? After the death of a close pal, JULIA LAWRENCE asks why many feel they are being 'soft' by deeply mourning the loss of a companion Julia Lawrence lost her friend Teresa Newham to Motor Neurone Disease Julie Clark lost Giselle Vella after being diagnosed with pancreatic cancer Emma Kingston's lifelong friend Lou died in a car accident when they were 27 Published: 22:04 GMT, 1 February 2017 | Updated: 22:05 GMT, 1 February 2017 14 shares
